name: Arcane Golf (itch)
description:
Arcane Golf is a miniature golf puzzle game set in a fantasy world full of dungeons, dangers, gems, and geometry. A joint production by @thatgregperkins and @FromLefcourt

Features:

  • 200 Levels
  • 4 unique dungeons
  • 20+ unique traps, powers, and creatures
  • Gorgeous, hand crafted pixel art
  • 35+ achievements
  • Playable entirely with just a mouse

Accessibility for gamers of all types:

  • Easy Reading mode shortens tutorials and increases font size
  • Visual Assist mode reduces background details and increases ball visibility
  • Level Skip lets you move to the next level and come back later
  • A variety of custom ball colors and animated cursors let you pick the best ball color (it's green) and nobody can take that away from you!

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

(may work on older systems, but this is the minimum tested)

  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 gHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, GeForce 8 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
